description:
Suggestion-komponent for autofullfør/søkeforslag.
Merk: Dette er en eksperimentell komponent fra DigDir.

props.name: filter
props.description:
Filter options; boolean or a custom callback.

See {@link Filter} for the callback signature.

props.name: creatable
props.description: Allows the user to create new items

props.name: onBeforeMatch
props.description: Callback when matching input value against options

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the associated form control

props.name: renderSelected
props.description: Change how the selected options are rendered inside the `Chip`.

props.name: multiple
props.description: Allows the user to select multiple items

props.name: selected
props.description:
The selected item of the Suggestion.

If `label` and `value` are the same, each item can be a `string`. Otherwise, each item must be a `SuggestionItem`.

Using this makes the component controlled and it must be used in combination with `onSelectedChange`.

props.name: defaultSelected
props.description: Default selected item when uncontrolled

props.name: onSelectedChange
props.description: Callback when selected items changes

props.description:

props.name: open
props.description: @note Unlike standard html, where the open attribute always opens a non-modal dialog, Dialog's open prop uses the `modal` prop to determine whether the Dialog is modal or non-modal
